sourcesContent:
<template>
  <section class="moderators">
    <tab-content-grid
      :showSearch="true"
      btnSecondary="Add"
      btnPrimary="Delete"
      title="Moderators"
      @handleSecondaryBtn="handleModalOpen(communityModalTypes.addMembers)"
      @handlePrimaryBtn="handleModalOpen(communityModalTypes.deleteMembers)"
      ><!-- @TODO change buttonHandlers -->
      <!-- @TODO output these components dynamically -->
      <group-component
        activityName="Follows from"
        date="01-24-2019, 07:21"
        :name="group.title"
        :bottomText="group.text"
        v-for="(group, index) in groups"
        :key="`${group.title}-${index}`"
      />
    </tab-content-grid>
  </section>
</template>

<script>
import {
  communityModalTypes,
  communityAreas,
  getModerators
} from '@/services/community.service';
import GroupComponent from '@/components/Blog/GroupComponent';
import TabContentGrid from '../common/TabContentGrid';

export default {
  name: communityAreas.moderators,
  components: {
    GroupComponent,
    TabContentGrid
  },
  props: {
    communityId: {
      type: String,
      required: true
    }
  },
  data() {
    return {
      data: null,
      communityModalTypes,
      groups: null
    };
  },
  methods: {
    handleModalOpen(modalType) {
      this.$emit('openModal', modalType);
    },
    async getData() {
      this.groups = await getModerators(this.communityId, 1);
    }
  },
  async mounted() {
    await this.getData();
  }
};
</script>
<style lang="scss" scoped>
::v-deep .group-title {
  &__text {
    font-size: var(--size-button);
  }
}
</style>
